import React,{useState} from 'react' import axios from "axios"; const ProductAddPage = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ categoryName: '', productName: '', quantity: '', uom: '', price: '', stock: '', image: null, description: '' }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission logic here try { console.log("Product Added:", formData); const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:3001/api/addProduct',formData); } catch (error) { console.error("There was an error adding product!", error); alert("An error occurred during the process. Please try again later."); } } return (
